name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious PowerShell Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed malicious PowerShell scripts to exfiltrate sensitive data.

parallel--d0a9731a-5dbb-4993-8533-b99da9.name: Mitigate PowerShell Threats
parallel--d0a9731a-5dbb-4993-8533-b99da9.description: Execute mitigation actions in parallel to handle the PowerShell threats.

action--c563b892-e9cd-4cc6-bc49-f0dc4f05.name: Kill malicious PowerShell process
action--c563b892-e9cd-4cc6-bc49-f0dc4f05.description: Terminate all malicious PowerShell processes that are running.

action--c62bff99-5721-43b0-b11d-8a4c94f2.name: Implement network firewall rules to block outbound traffic
action--c62bff99-5721-43b0-b11d-8a4c94f2.description: Set firewall rules to block outbound traffic on port 80 to prevent data exfiltration.

action--6d3c4324-82d4-41fb-be19-a6d62b7f.name: Run antivirus scan on impacted host
action--6d3c4324-82d4-41fb-be19-a6d62b7f.description: Perform a repeated antivirus scan until no threats are found on the impacted host.
